decks.notes: This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming opponents with low-cost creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Callous Sell-Sword, buffed by spells like Infuriate and Monstrous Rage. The deck also utilizes direct damage spells like Reckless Rage and Heartfire Hero to control the board and finish off opponents. Den of the Bugbear and Ramunap Ruins provide additional damage opportunities, while cards like Claim / Fame and Fatal Push offer versatile removal options. The deck's aggressive strategy aims to secure victory before opponents can stabilize or mount a strong defense.

This deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures and burn spells to quickly bring down the opponent's life total. By utilizing efficient removal spells and disruptive hand disruption, the deck aims to control the board and maintain pressure on the opponent. The deck also leverages powerful creatures like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Blade of the Oni to overwhelm the opponent and close out the game quickly. The mana base is designed to support the aggressive strategy with a mix of fast lands, fetch lands, and utility lands.

The deck focuses on quickly building a board presence with low-cost creatures and disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben and Archon of Emeria. It aims to apply pressure early and efficiently with cards like Collected Company to generate value and board advantage. The deck also includes powerful removal options like Skyclave Apparition to deal with threats and maintain tempo. The strategy revolves around aggressive combat actions and utilizing synergies between creatures to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory.

This deck focuses on deploying low-cost Spirit creatures onto the battlefield quickly and efficiently to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy. The key to this deck is to maximize the strength of Spirit creatures by utilizing cards that support their abilities and capitalize on their synergy with each other. The deck also includes spells that disrupt the opponent's plans and protect your own creatures, ensuring that your aggressive strategy remains effective throughout the game.

The primary focus of this Jund Aggro deck is to quickly deploy aggressive threats such as Yagra, Eater of All and Mayhem Devil while disrupting the opponent with removal spells like Fatal Push and Claim the Firstborn. The deck also utilizes the sacrifice synergy between Cauldron Familiar, Witch's Oven, and Deadly Dispute to generate value and pressure the opponent. With a mix of efficient creatures, disruption, and sacrifice outlets, this deck aims to apply relentless pressure on the opponent and close out the game before they can stabilize.
